subtitle: This hearty potato pie is perfect for a weekday meal for the family.

method.text: Make up the instant potato with the boiling water and butter. Leave to cool a little before adding the eggs and <sup>3</sup>/<sub>4</sub> of the parsley.
Spoon the mixture into a greased 23 cm loose-based cake tin. Spread the mixture up the sides and over the base, making a hole in the middle. Bake for 15-20 min.

Meanwhile, dry-fry the mince in a frying pan for 5 min, or until lightly browned.  Add the onion, garlic, mushrooms, green pepper, and tomatoes, and stir over a gentle heat for 2 min. Stir in the remaining ingredients.
Bring to the boil, then simmer uncovered for 20-25 min, stirring occasionally. Spoon the mixture into the potato case. Sprinkle with remaining parsley and garnish with the chilli.

title: Mashed potato pie
